attributes.action: Allow the uk people to decide if the eu laws suit the british way of life and to finnally give the majority of the uk people what they want which is freedom fron the eu and another public referendum do we stay or do we leave.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since joining the eu our country has become totaly different as of changes forced upon britain by europe. since we have joined the uk goverment as spent billions into europe and about 50, million and more each year. that money over the course of time would of been better spent in this country on social housing, nhs, education to name a few. our country is becoming the overpopulated joke of europe, and more british familys are being forced to leave as they dont like the changes being made in the country they grew up in. enough is enough please dont make people of this country speak quietly in corners let them have there say by signing this petition.
